den für ihn so wichtigen Schlag der Uhr

e.d: in order to moisten his lips
with it; with them; so that

to concentrate on, to become absorbed in

welche sich eng zum Gitter setzten
e.d: who sat right up next to the bars
to be content or satisfied with
you, to you; them, to them
to put something at someone's disposal
all just in order to keep them awake

e.f: wie keiner von ihnen es könnte
e.d: as none of them was able
after a difficult night spent awake
only for the sake of principle
to undertake, to assume; to take over

e.f: aber bei ihren Verdächtigungen blieben sie dennoch
e.d: but they nevertheless stuck by their suspicions

so; thus; that way; like this/that
namely, that is to say, as you may say
namely, that is to say, as you might say
an initiate, someone in the know

e.f: die leichteste Sache von der Welt
e.d: the easiest thing in the world
at best; given the most favorable interpretation
addicted to publicity, anxious to have publicity

e.f: weil er es sich leicht zu machen verstand
e.d: because he knew how to make it easy
to have the nerve, be so impudent
to put up with; to accept

e.f: dieses Zeugnis musste man ihm ausstellen

not even in the great metropolises
to malfunction; fail; fail to work

a meal designed for a sick person
of the ladies bending down toward him
to straighten oneself, get into an upright position

e.d: the very thought of which produced nausea

e.d: but in a totally different sense
to seize, to catch; to hold

e.d: not without out giving him a concealed little shake
to sway, to roll, to rock, to shake

e.f: für satte Menschen nicht ohne weiteres begreiflich

the assertion, explicable for the very same reason,

e.f: er könnte noch viel länger hungern
e.d: that he could fast much longer

e.d: there may well have been more profound reasons

e.f: aber wem lag daran, sie aufzufinden
e.d: but who cared to find out what they were
as if in a secret conspiracy

e.f: um einen andern Beruf zu ergreifen

e.d: to be dedicated to, devoted to
to say good bye to; to dismiss

e.f: ließ sich von einem großen Zirkus engagieren
